title: A schema for defining HIDs with JSON

ConsoleName.description: The name of the console this controller is associated with

AxisNameSuffix.description: The suffix of an axis that shouldn't have Axis appended to its name

buttons.description: A list of buttons on the controller

items.description: A description of a button on the controller

niValue.description: The button value for NI DS

sdlValue.description: The button value for SDL DS

DocName.description: The name of the button to use in docs

sticks.description: A list of joysticks on the controller

NameParts.description: The parts of the joystick name in lowerCamelCase

items.description: The different components of a joystick name, direction and axis

niValue.description: The axis value for NI DS

sdlValue.description: The axis value for SDL DS

PositiveDirection.description: The positive direction of the axis.

triggers.description: A list of triggers on the controller

items.description: A description of a trigger on the controller

name.description: The name of the trigger to use in code

niValue.description: The axis value for NI DS

sdlValue.description: The axis value for SDL DS

DocName.description: The name of the trigger for use in docs

UseThresholdMethods.description: Whether or not an method is created where an event fires based on the axis value
